metadata.name: Sound Texture #01
metadata.description:
Sound Textures is a continuation of Sound Paintings - a series of audiovisual compositions exploring frequency driven painted textures designed to amplify the sonic details of the audio within a set of constraints. The works are created in Vuo using a live audio input and captured in real-time. 

Audio: Variants 1 by Jorge Ciccioli & Max Donato, released on Voices Records.

Artwork information: 1920x1080 pixels · 60fps · 00’22” · 2022
